channel.title: Classes repeating
channel.description:
#### What happened? in two games I played randomly with 2 other people and each of us got the same class both games. Thats 3 people, same class, 2 games in a row. Odd but not THAT odd I guess. Also, I have been playing all day and the classes have been coming in sets of 3 or 4 games at a time. A lot of others seeing this as well.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? Not that?
#### Steps to reproduce: Many people, in fact every game I have played in today, have been seeing this....so much for RNG?!
#### Comments: I really hope someone looks into this....i am all about coincidence, but this....feels off.
